Trainee Quality Control Officer Job at AB Microfinance Bank




        
    

        
        AB Microfinance Bank is a national microfinance bank licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), with its head office in Lagos and branches spread across Lagos, Oyo, Ogun, Ondo and Anambra State.

AB Microfinance Bank Nigeria is committed to its passion of helping to improve the business opportunities of entrepreneurs by availing them of easy access to affordable loans, as well as improve the general financial status of everyone with its deposit accounts. It is a limited liability company duly incorporated in Nigeria under the 2002 Companies and Allied Matters Act, and is regulated by the Central Bank of Nigeria as a fully fledged microfinance bank.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Trainee Quality Control Officer
Reference Code: TQCO/C/NOV/2025
Job Locations: Oke-Arin, Lagos and Ijebu-Ode, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Main Responsibilities


	Application and Proposal data entry into the Bank’s software systems.
	Control of Credit files and fulfilment of Credit committee decision.
	Preparation of documents for disbursement of loans under the supervision of an experienced QCO.
	Coordinating loan clients for disbursement according to disbursement schedules.
	Verifies and balances data by reviewing data; pulling and returning data to user for correction.
	Completes data management by sorting, batching, and archiving files.
	Responsible for files transfer within branches.


Requirements


	Minimum educational qualification of B.Sc Degree / HND qualification in any discipline.
	At least 1 year of working experience in any related field would be an added advantage.
	Excellent Data Entry skill with a high level of accuracy.
	Excellent time management.
	Good communication and Interpersonal Skills.
	Excellent customer service relation.
	Ability to work effectively with minimal supervision.


Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

  "title": "Internal Auditor",
  "description": "The Label Store is a dynamic retail business that caters to a diverse range of customer needs. In addition to clothing and accessories, they also offer a carefully curated selection of groceries. With an emphasis on high-quality and healthy products, the Label Store&#39;s grocery section is a favorite among health-conscious shoppers. From fresh produce to pantry staples, the Label Store ensures that all of its products meet strict quality standards. With a dedication to offering an unparalleled shopping experience, the Label Store has become a one-stop shop for customers looking for fashion-forward clothing, stylish accessories and wholesome groceries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Auditor

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Minimum of B.Sc. or HND in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 7 years of relevant work experience in auditing or internal control.
	ICAN Certification or ongoing ICAN qualification is an added advantage.
	Proven experience in auditing, internal control, or accounting functions, preferably within a retail, FMCG, or supermarket environment.
	Strong analytical, investigative, and reporting skills.
	Sound knowledge of accounting principles, internal control systems, and audit standards.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software.
	Excellent attention to detail, integrity, confidentiality, and ability to work with minimal supervision.


Responsibilities


	Conduct regular and surprise audits of all departments and branches to ensure compliance with company policies and financial procedures.
	Review cash handling, sales records, inventory management, and expense documentation for accuracy and completeness.
	Detect and report discrepancies, fraud, or policy violations promptly to management.
	Verify stock balances, supplier transactions, and store activities to ensure accountability.
	Evaluate internal control systems and recommend improvements to enhance operational efficiency.
	Prepare detailed audit reports and submit findings with corrective action plans to the Head of Audit and Management.
	Monitor the implementation of audit recommendations and follow up on compliance.
	Support management in risk assessment, loss prevention, and process improvement initiatives.


Salary
N200,000 -&nbsp; N400,000 per month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: thelabelstoreng@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	For more information, contact via WhatsApp: 08168090068
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Minimum of B.Sc. or HND in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 7 years of relevant work experience in auditing or internal control.
	ICAN Certification or ongoing ICAN qualification is an added advantage.
	Proven experience in auditing, internal control, or accounting functions, preferably within a retail, FMCG, or supermarket environment.
	Strong analytical, investigative, and reporting skills.
	Sound knowledge of accounting principles, internal control systems, and audit standards.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software.
	Excellent attention to detail, integrity, confidentiality, and ability to work with minimal supervision.


Responsibilities


	Conduct regular and surprise audits of all departments and branches to ensure compliance with company policies and financial procedures.
	Review cash handling, sales records, inventory management, and expense documentation for accuracy and completeness.
	Detect and report discrepancies, fraud, or policy violations promptly to management.
	Verify stock balances, supplier transactions, and store activities to ensure accountability.
	Evaluate internal control systems and recommend improvements to enhance operational efficiency.
	Prepare detailed audit reports and submit findings with corrective action plans to the Head of Audit and Management.
	Monitor the implementation of audit recommendations and follow up on compliance.
	Support management in risk assessment, loss prevention, and process improvement initiatives.


Salary
N200,000 -  N400,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: thelabelstoreng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	For more information, contact via WhatsApp: 08168090068
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
